Current Status Beta

Beta testers should use https://synergy.sfcknox.org. Changes every 1 to two weeks

New featers are tested at https://synergy_beta.sfcknox.org. Changes every few days

Both urls run on the same server and share the same user data. So if you make changes on one link it will be refected in the other.

google Doc Beta testers can have comment access to this document. I will add premssions as I talk with beta testers or they request access.
